title: Introduction to Wastewater
description: Learn what wastewater is and why treatment is essential.

title: Wastewater Treatment Overview
description: Understand the major steps in treating wastewater.

title: Key Terminology & Acronyms
description: Master the vocabulary used in the industry.

title: Microbiology in Wastewater
description: Learn in depth about the biological treatment of wastewater.

title: Math for Wastewater Operators
description: Learn the math used for Wastewater and how it affects the process.

title: Equipment Identification
description: Learn the common equipment used in wastewater.

title: Troubleshooting
description: Learn how to troubleshoot common challenges in a wastewater plant that you'll face as an operator.
